name: Frenzy Rampage Survivor
description:
The world is plagued with dangerously noisy humans! Rampage through the streets destroying their precious buildings and military defences. Time to grow stronger than ever and let go that frenzy inside you. Get stomping, kicking, tail swiping even laser beaming of fiery doom! Wreck up billions, no TRILLIONS in dollars worth of damage on your path. How to play: - WASD or Arrow Keys to move
- Destroy buildings and step on civilians to recover health
- Engage  dangerous earthlings to earn experience points and unlock new skills! Time for another rampage! Frenzy Rampage Survivor was made in a two-day game jam using Godot. Your glitch mileage may vary

Made by
